cmipaccess
  • <no title>

cmipaccess.data_access.get_CMIP6_data

Loads gridded CMIP6 data from spirit or esgf

cmipaccess.path_search.get_path_CMIP_data

Returns path to access gridded CMIP data from either CMIP5 or CMIP6

cmipaccess.path_search.print_list

cmipaccess.tools.sort_realisations

cmipaccess.esgf.esgf_data_access.esgf_search

Example:

cmipaccess.esgf.find_available_data.find_models_experiment

Finds the models where the experiment has been ran and where the variable is available

cmipaccess.esgf.find_available_data.find_realisations_experiment

Finds the realisations where the experiment has been ran with the model and where the variable is available

cmipaccess.esgf.path_cell_search.get_path_cell

Finds the paths to a cell area file on esgf

cmipaccess.esgf.path_search.get_path_CMIP5_data

Returns the remote ESGF path to the corresponding CMIP5 datasets they exist on ESGF.

cmipaccess.esgf.path_search.get_path_CMIP6_data

Returns the remote ESGF path to the corresponding datasets they exist on ESGF.

cmipaccess.esgf.path_search.get_path_CMIP_data

Returns path to access gridded CMIP data from either CMIP5 or CMIP6

cmipaccess.esgf.path_search.print_list

cmipaccess.local.cell_files.download_cell_file

Download the file for cell area size

cmipaccess.local.cell_files.get_cell_data

Opens a dataset containing cell area data for a given model and grid

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_all_detrended_global_time_series

Returns all global mean time series for a given experiment, model and variable.

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_all_detrended_global_time_series_multivariable

Return detrended time series of multiple variables

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_detrended_global_time_series

Return the global time series of a variable with the control experiment drift removed.

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_global_time_series

Return an xarray Dataset containing a global mean time series of the variable required.

cmipaccess.local.global_data_access.get_global_toa_energy_budget

Load global mean time series of tas, rsut, rlut, rsdt and eei for the given model and experiment.

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_all_realisations_all_models

Downloads global time series for all models and all experiments available for a given experiment

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_all_realisations_one_model

Download timeseries for all available realisations for multiple variables

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_multi_variables_timeseries

Downloads global mean time series for multiple variables to local directory

cmipaccess.local.global_data_download.download_single_timeseries

Downloads single global mean time series to local directory

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP5_data

Returns the local path to the corresponding CMIP5 datasets if the data exist on spirit.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP6_data

Returns the local path to the corresponding CMIP6 datasets if the data exist on spirit.

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.get_path_CMIP_data

Returns path to access gridded CMIP data from either CMIP5 or CMIP6

cmipaccess.spiritx.path_search.print_list
